title: How to fix Google pixel 4a so that apps will work?
content: Pixel 4A will no longer allow apps to open. Restarting, clearing cash, deleting and reinstalling app did not work. Upon trying to open, the app will open and immediately close. After some time a message will flash on the screen that the app is not responding. I've restarted multiple times. Cleared the cash multiple times. The error message continues to quickly flash.
